name: Gerard Dacudao
text: Valid points.  Well articulated concerns, Luc.  But I still think nauunahan kayo sa takot.  Davao mind you is a huge track land to manage too. It is maybe 1/3 of Mindanao if you unite all Davao provinces.  And style lang dyan is to institutionalize yung tapang.  Yung no nonsense criminal justice system and decentralizatio n ng Manila.    So ano ang choices natin?  At the end, imho, si Du30 lang.  Wala ng iba.  Others are all lip service.

source_obj.text: Valid points.  Well articulated concerns, Luc.  But I still think nauunahan kayo sa takot.  Davao mind you is a huge track land to manage too. It is maybe 1/3 of Mindanao if you unite all Davao provinces.  And style lang dyan is to institutionalize yung tapang.  Yung no nonsense criminal justice system and decentralizatio n ng Manila.    So ano ang choices natin?  At the end, imho, si Du30 lang.  Wala ng iba.  Others are all lip service.
